front.title: Route Configuration by DHCPv6 Option for Hosts with Multiple Interfaces

abstract.t: Currently, more and more hosts have multiple interfaces such as GPRS,WiFi etc. One key issue is how to make the applications on the hostaccess the network accordingly through the proper interfaces. Theapproach presented in this document is to define new DHCPv6 option toconfigure route tables of the hosts. In this way, the hosts canselect a appropriate route.
